product_name: Big Agnes King Solomon +15 Sleeping Bag - Double
long_description: Offering the same great features as a single Big Agnes sleeping bag, the spacious King Solomon +15degF double bag is designed to sleep 2 people comfortably. High-quality 600-fill-power goose down is warm, lightweight and compressible. Ripstop nylon microfiber shell features a Durable Water Repellent finish causing moisture to bead up and roll off; soft, downproof nylon lining resists stains. Underside insulation has been eliminated and replaced with sleeves for 2 72 x 20 in. pads (sold separately). Built-in pillow pocket for each person lets you stuff a jacket or a pillow inside. Draft collar for each person keeps cold air from sneaking in around the neck. Zippers on each side allow easy access for both sleepers; draft tubes back zippers to prevent warm air from escaping and cold air from entering. Internal loops allow attachment of a sleeping bag liner, sold separately. Comes with a stuff sack and cotton storage bag.
